listOfQuestions.question: What is JK Rowling's full name?
What is the name of the boy wizard in Rowling's series?
In which book does Harry first visit Diagon Alley?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
wrongAnswers: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

listOfQuestions.question: What is the name of Harry's owl?
What house at Hogwarts does Harry belong to?
Who is the headmaster of Hogwarts during most of the series?
What is the magical object that grants its owner immortality?
Who is Harry's best friend?
What is the name of the school that Harry Potter attends?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

listOfQuestions.question: What spell is used to disarm an opponent?
What creature is Hagrid's pet?
What is the name of Harry's arch-nemesis?
What is Hermione's Patronus?
What is the name of the pub in London that serves as a gateway to the wizarding world?
What is the subject taught by Professor Snape?
Who are Harry's main rivals in Quidditch?
What are the names of Harry's parents?
What does the spell 'Lumos' do?
What type of magical creature is a Thestral?
What is the name of the Weasley family's home?
What shape does Hermione's Patronus take when she first conjures it?
In what book does Harry encounter the Deathly Hallows?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
wrongAnswers: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

listOfQuestions.question: What does the potion Felix Felicis do?
What does the spell 'Accio' do?
Which magical object can make you invisible?
How many books are in the Harry Potter series?
What is the name of the Divination professor?
What creature pulls the carriages at Hogwarts?
Which potion is known as the 'polyjuice potion'?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: A potion that allows you to take the appearance of someone else
wrongAnswers: A potion that makes you invincible
A potion that grants eternal life

listOfQuestions.question: Who is the author of the Harry Potter series?
What is the name of the wizarding bank in Diagon Alley?
What is the final book in the Harry Potter series?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
wrongAnswers: Harry Potter and the Cursed Child
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
